name: discord-notification-feed
description: A Discord notification tracker that shows your notifications in a clean feed
author: xal3xhx

scripts.build:unpack: npm run build && electron-builder --dir && echo "✅ Build created in dist/win-unpacked. To create an installer, use npm run build:win"
scripts.build:win: npm run build && electron-builder --win && echo "✅ Windows build completed! Installer is in dist/ directory. For automated releases, push a tag like 'v1.0.0' to GitHub."
scripts.build:mac: npm run build && electron-builder --mac && echo "✅ macOS build completed! Installer is in dist/ directory."
scripts.build:linux: npm run build && electron-builder --linux && echo "✅ Linux build completed! Packages are in dist/ directory."
scripts.release: node -e "console.log('To create a new release, run: scripts/release.bat <version> (Windows) or scripts/release.sh <version> (Mac/Linux)')"
